senses.sense_definition: Any ornamental plant of the genus Nicotiana, often grown in gardens for its fragrant flowers.

examples.text: The sweet scent of the <w>nicotiana</w> becomes much stronger in the evening air.
Gardeners often choose flowering <w>nicotiana</w> to add height and fragrance to their flower beds.

senses.sense_definition: Literature or collected writings that deal specifically with the subject of tobacco smoking.

examples.text: The collector proudly displayed his rare volume of <w>nicotiana</w> from the eighteenth century.
Scholars of social history sometimes study <w>nicotiana</w> to understand past attitudes toward smoking.

traits.comment: refers to a specific genre of collection
